sentence.Network_cn: 我使用的是无香型走珠除臭剂。

sentence.Network_en: She applies deodorant to her armpits after she showers.
sentence.Network_cn: 沐浴后,她在腋下涂上除臭剂.

sentence.Network_en: He rubbed some deodorant under his armpits before dressing.
sentence.Network_cn: 穿衣时,他往腋下擦了些防臭剂.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from de- (expressing removal) + Latin odor 'smell' + -ant

entry.tran: (用于除去体味的)除臭剂，解臭剂
entry.def: Deodorant is a substance that you can use on your body to hide or prevent the smell of sweat.

means.word_mean: 1. a toiletry applied to the skin in order to mask unpleasant odors

stems_affixes.word_buile: assist帮助+ant……人→adj.帮助的,辅助的 n.助手,助教;辅助物
discord不合,不一致+ant……的→adj.不一致的,不调和的
extra超出+vag漫游,走+ant……的→走得过分→奢侈的
ex出+uber果实累累+ant……的→adj.[人]充满活力的;[植物]茂盛的

in进入+toxic有毒的+ant……的→中毒了的→醉人的
repent后悔+ant……的→adj.对…感到悔恨的
resist抵抗+ant……的→adj.[to]抵抗的,有抵抗力的
retard延迟+ant……的→adj.延缓的,使迟滞的

disinfect消毒+ant……剂→n.消毒剂

stimul=sting刺+ant……剂→n.兴奋剂,刺激物
